name: Katharine Jeannette Bush
description: One of the First women to receive a Ph.D. in the sciences at Yale University

name: Grace Hopper
occupation: Computer Scientist & U.S. Navy Rear Admiral
description: Early leader of computer programming and inventor of foundational compiler tools that have shaped the future of modern computing

name: Dorrit Hoffleit
description: Inventor of the Bright Star Catalog

name: Maxine Singer
description: Contributor to research on solving the genetic code in DNA

name: Dorothy Horstmann
description: First woman appointed as a professor at the Yale School of Medicine
